website_summaries.verdict: This dry box floats and is just large enough for your credit card or ID, room key or some cash.
pros: Comes in both opaque and translucent color options
cons: If you need to carry an electronic car key, this box will likely be too small

customer_reviews.title: Actually performs as promised!
customer_reviews.text: After doing hours of research online, we chose this product and I am soooo glad that we did. Last week we used this product to keep our valuables safe and dry during a cruise. It performed perfectly after being used on Dunn’s River Falls in Jamaica and snorkeling underwater in a few other countries. People who bought other brands were disappointed when their items got wet and the containers leaked. This one scores a 100 percent thumbs up for me, so stop your searching and buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Paddled a few times with it fine. Then somehow the case popped out of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I tested these in a bucket first with just paper inside. Paddled a few times with it fine. Then somehow the case popped out of my PFD pouch while I was paddling in the ocean. I didn't notice it popping out but I did notice a bright yellow box floating about 10 feet from me and knew right away it was my electronic ignition car key. Needless to say the bright yellow color was chosen so it would be easy to spot - it was, and it definitely floats. I should have used the lanyard that came with it to tie it inside my PFD pouch. Now I know.
customer_reviews.author: Metapulp Inc

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We need a waterproof case for our 2 children. They wear hearing aids and it's the perfect container when they go swimming. I love the fact that this was a 2 pack, so both were able to have one, and the little linen pouch is great for my daughter to put her earrings in so she won't lose them. Definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle McKenna

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. They are a nice size that could easily ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They are a nice size that could easily hold some cards/id and cash. A key would also fit in it if didn't have a fat fob on it. When they arrived I stuck a paper towel in each one and submerged them for 90 min. When I pulled them out of the water, the towels inside were still completely dry. Taking them on a trip later this year, so that will be the real test.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Stonehocker

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I had a back up plan in case this didn't work out, but not needed! I took this with me in the cenotes in Mexico and every time I went snorkeling and had no problems at all. My primary concern was the key fob for the car and it was safe and dry in this container. I used this along with my flipbelt, a spandex belt that fits snug around the waist that has openings to slide items into for hands free exploring (or running/walking) I wore it in the water and no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great little tag-along for keys/cash and other small stuff
customer_reviews.text: These are just like I remembered from my childhood when my dad used to take us to the beach. I wanted them for my upcoming canoe/kayak trip to store keys and other small stuff that I didn't want to lose or float away. I love the fact that they are yellow (a few reviews mentioned they didn't even notice it was gone until they saw a yellow object in the water) and that they come with a carabiner and a landyard in case you want to wear it around your neck or attach it to your lifevest. Good price for a pack of 2.
customer_reviews.author: Moskwaka

customer_reviews.title: Weak and brittle, and broken
customer_reviews.text: Broke the second time I took it in my kayak with me. Not durable at all and wouldn't trust it with anything you don't want to lose. The latch also seems tiny and (because it sticks out) prone to causing issues or maybe popping open... but it didn't last long enough to test that. Maybe that's how the other one will break. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: Goodies

customer_reviews.title: Latch poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP latch. If it gets even slightly knocked or pulled... Let's say like jostled around during body surfing, which is why I bought it; people said it should work. Sorry, won't trust it with my Prius Key! I think like someone else joked, I'll ACTUALLY get a plastic bag whirl pull string attached and stick my car key up my ass. If you do buy this, bare minimum (pun intended) use a rubber band or tie down to latch down the poorly designed latch.. But the koala bag was cute.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Too thin to be useful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product in order to put my car ignition fob when doing water sports. The case I received would work for a couple of credit cards or an ID, which are already water-proof, but is way, way too thin to hold a key-fob. It is too long, too wide, but not deep enough for anything but cards.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Morris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this brand and case for approximately ten years. I work in an environment where you must display your badge at all times. It does not only hold my badge, but I also place my ID and dollars, so I don't have to carry my purse while moving around the building. I have not had any issues with anything falling out of the holder, but I have replaced it every couple of years. I do open the holder many times during the day. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: girllovesdeals

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just got back from a Caribbean cruise, and we used the waterproof floating case while snorkeling and swimming....WOW they were excellent in keeping the contents DRY!! I would HIGHLY recommend these to anyone that is a swimmer, snorkeling, etc. and want to keep some cash, cards, key, etc. dry and the case FLOATS!! That's a very important thing if it happens to come off your neck. I kept mine around my neck and under my swim shirt/suit.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Just right for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and lightweight for maybe keeping a couple of things dry while at the beach. I got two of them and one shuts tighter than the other so I mostly use the tighter one. They are hard plastic with a rubber seal embedded all around the opening. I've used mine for a couple of weeks while I wade in the water with my metal detector with occasional water exposure and so far no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: eng_steve

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Were a little smaller than I expected, but turned out to be just about perfect. held a few cards and enough paper money. liked the security strap when using both in and out the water. One observation is that it floats, so in the ocean it can float out of your pocket, so make sure its tethered to you.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Nice waterproof item holder
customer_reviews.text: Well-made cases. I wanted to fit my keys in there, but the box won't take them on a ring... takes cards and money fine. I suppose the intent is to keep these on the wrist or around the neck, but I don't like that. It's not safe for swimming, so I carry the box in my pocket when I absolutely have to have this stuff on me. The only issue is that since there's air inside the sealed box, it's buoyant and wants to come to the surface... so that's tricky..
customer_reviews.author: E!

customer_reviews.title: A kayaker best friend
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I am an avid kayaker and for years I've been putting my ID and credit card in a ziplock bag and I wanted to upgrade. I went with the small version and it holds my ID, credit card, and truck key. I tested out the floating capability in my sink and it floats and kept everything dry. You could probably put a few cigarettes in there but you cannot fit a lighter so if that is what you're trying to do, this is not what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ruz

customer_reviews.title: Love using this to swim in the ocean
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to keep my keys and fob with me when I go swimming at the beach. I can keep this in my pocket, that way I don't have to worry about it getting stolen while working out. It keeps everything dry, and is a decent size. I might be able to fit a card in there, but it would be very tight. For now it is perfect for the key and fob!
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Lee

customer_reviews.title: The latch was very easy to operate and it kept all my things dry
customer_reviews.text: I tested these out over the weekend at an indoor water park. I found the inside to be very roomy for credit cards, cash, a license. The latch was very easy to operate and it kept all my things dry.
customer_reviews.author: Meli2701

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but manageable
customer_reviews.text: The item came in on time. It wasnt as large as I expected but may be convenient for what I need. I copied my id and had to fold the paper more than 4 times in half in order for it to fit inside the container. It has an outside compression lock but it does not appear to be waterproof. Only time will tell. It is big enough to hold an actual I'd or credit card and the lanyard is a nice addition. I will update this once I get back from my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Edric Salone

customer_reviews.title: Worked great around the pool/ocean
customer_reviews.text: Used to carry cash and room keys for a trip to Punta Cana. Worked great around the pool/ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Helland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use these storage containers to keep my saxophone and clarinet reeds moist. I put the reeds in the container along with a little piece of sponge that has been soaked in original listerine. The reeds stay moist and do not mold. They last longer and are less likely to warp. The containers work perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: P. I. M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a pre-review
customer_reviews.text: The product as delivered is expected to perform as advertised. I purchased for a future dive trip so I've not had an opportunity to truly test this product; but if it does not perform I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Evans

customer_reviews.title: Water tight function of the product, and excellent customer service by Koala
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure that the Witz waterproof container would be unobtrusive tucked into my wetsuit. But it worked perfectly. Now I can set my car alarm. Put the fob in the case. Tuck it into my wetsuit. And surf without concern of a break in while I’m in the water. Incredible product! Many thanks Koala. And thanks for your response to my email. Best, Kyle
customer_reviews.author: kyle gill

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I roll my own cigarettes, so it’s nice to have a reusable case. I do a lot of water and snow sports/activities, so having the case be waterproof is pretty important too. I used these all summer while floating down the river in a tube, going out on a boat, kayaking, etc, and they kept everything inside dry.
customer_reviews.author: Angi

customer_reviews.title: easy accessibility, convenient viewing of contents
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, easy accessibility, convenient viewing of contents. Needed a replacement work badge case, and this perfectly fit the need, while also providing an extra level of water tight security as an added point.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dexcom receiver at water park!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for carrying my daughter’s dexcom receiver in,at the water park or beach. We do use a rubber band around the latch to make sure it doesn’t get popped open in the wave pool though.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Myers

customer_reviews.title: A must-have at the beach
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these years ago and loved it. It was broken and nothing I've tried since has worked as well. They are absolutely perfect for the beach/pool. The new one is wider than my old one which makes it even more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff B

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It's meant to keep moisture out of what you have inside of it.. I use to keep my saxophone reeds in it moist! Works really well; this was a great alternative to products made for that which cost 2-3x more than this. Thank you, Koala Lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Franky G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beach Storage
customer_reviews.text: Great for carrying spare cash, credit cards, driver's license. I ordered small size for something else and should have ordered large but that is my problem. Excellent little dry box and fits VERY nicely into a shirt or trouser pocket.
customer_reviews.author: N. Toney

customer_reviews.title: Dry and secure storage!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to hold our money and credit cards while on a cruise. The lanyard worked well to hang as a necklace walking around the ship. They were light and easy to open. We snorkeled and swam with them. We bought the bright yellow, so we could easily find them. Everything stayed dry! I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Ivins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cruises and beach days
customer_reviews.text: Got these to take on our next cruise. Had a similar product before and anticipate that these will hold up better for water and boating.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a trip to the tropics. Put the rental car key in it and put it in my bathing suit pocket. I wasnt jumping around or anything active and still found about a teaspoon of water inside. Not a whole lot but still not waterproof. Waterproof was the whole point of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sansanz

customer_reviews.title: Not so waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to use as a wallet during my vacation. Our days were packed with lots of hiking and swimming. This case worked fine until my last day where I was swimming in the ocean under rather rough condition. When I went back to my car, I found out this case was full of water:( fortunately, I just had some cash and credit cards that moment. I would use this case with caution.
customer_reviews.author: yk1

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Security
customer_reviews.text: I took this product with me on my cruise. It was perfect! I was able to put my ID, credit card and cash in it. I wore this in the water and nothing ever got wet. Another good feature is that it floats.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great product. It is definitely waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to hold some things while white water rafting. I got tossed out in a class IV rapid, and all was dry inside.
customer_reviews.author: claydeer

customer_reviews.title: No leaks and excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: We use these at water aerobics to put our keys and drivers license. Works great with super a super seal!
customer_reviews.author: Jetty

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Large option and my goodness it is Large! Haha I like it though, it will hold a lot of items for me and I can't wait to use it. 2 for the price is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: agforever

customer_reviews.title: Bought for hearing aids.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a waterproof container for my hearing aids for an upcoming cruise. I bought this. They fit inside perfectly. Will be great for the water park too!
customer_reviews.author: DottieKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bought it for myself and our son to use at the local water park and it works great. Easily holds our car fob, water park cards and money and keeps everything nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Travis and April S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived when ordered and it was exactly what I needed for our cruise
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Ocean Capable
customer_reviews.text: I used this to keep cash and cards on me while snorkeling in Grand Cayman. Worked every day for my whole vacation. Completely air tight. Served it’s purpose admirably.
customer_reviews.author: Josham623

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waterproof case for a solo beach getaway. I wanted to be able to carry my cash and cards on me in the water in case I didn't feel safe leaving my belongings unattended on the beach. It worked great. Waterproof, sand proof, and easy to find in my beach bag. 11/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works well on the paddle boards keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works well on the paddle boards keeps keys dry and also on the boat, great place to keep a little money for that happy hour cocktail.
customer_reviews.author: michael abbott

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product. Bought to go to Costa Rica and checked item by Submerging it underwater for over a hour by putting a weight on it as it does float. Not one drop of water,and after using it in Costa Rica I'm very happy with these products.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a bit smaller. I was looking for an ID carrier that would fit comfortably into a running shorts side pocket. This is not the product for that, way too big for the pocket, even when I tried to trim it a bit. Waste of my money. Would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Dogg

customer_reviews.title: the size is perfict
customer_reviews.text: this is what I was looking for fits all fishing lic. and ids. I need to take my grand kid fishing half the fun is swimming to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy hinge
customer_reviews.text: The hinge is far more stronger on this one vs the cheaper ones. Better buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse D

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: a must have if you are a beach goer, boat rider or any combination that would bring you to the beaches/on the water. keeps credit cards, license and money in one safe, dry place. small and thin - perfect for bar hoping too...
customer_reviews.author: jim rausch

customer_reviews.title: It worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I used it to carry my ID, CC, & some folded up cash while we were on the beach and in the water. There was only 1 time where a hint of moisture got in, but otherwise it kept my cash dry. It was under water for more than an hour at a time and kept the seal. I had no problems with the latch, but I was hard on it either. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I’m a kayaker and need something to keep my DL & fishing license in. This is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Hook came off. I could have lost my license in water if I didn't catch it right away
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. Hook came off while I was in the ocean. If I didn't quickly catch the box, I would have lost my drivers license, Cruise card and money. It was also too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice products and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought size small, because a couple of cards and some money is all I need to fit in there. I tested them in the sink. They're waterproof and float on the water.
customer_reviews.author: caronmi

customer_reviews.title: I tested this like the product information said to do
customer_reviews.text: I tested this like the product information said to do. Worked great! Can't wait until I try it on vacation. Fast shipping and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: marcenepea

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of free diving and need something to put my car key in. This works great and if it gets detached, the bright colors make it easier to find
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Mizota

customer_reviews.title: I love it 👍🏾👍🏾!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I originally wanted to order the smaller somewhat slimmer case but the bigger one was actually better for me. I could even fit my chapstick and gum in the case along with all of my badges. Money well spent on this item 👍🏾👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B

customer_reviews.title: My favorite gift to give!
customer_reviews.text: These are super functional AND have a koala bear on them!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go to cedar point, so far it has been awesome!! It is plenty roomie for cash and cards, doesn't slip off in the water and keeps everything dry! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Koala is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy all my purchases from Koala so far. Great customer service if needed
customer_reviews.author: AH House

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Need a way to store keys when going surfing, this is the perfect solution. Water proof, floats, and super visible when in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting one for years. Love the product, the little koala face on it, and the nice message I got from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Nicolaisen

customer_reviews.title: Nice size..
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast shipping. Product looks just what i needed. Go on cruise next month to try it out . I like the lanyard and the clip option.
customer_reviews.author: VinnyP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carrying your ID and/or credit cards when you’re ...
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used these waterproof cases before and they’ve always lived up to their reputation. Perfect for carrying your ID and/or credit cards when you’re swimming or snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved his, almost never used mine
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a trip to Mexico. Husband loved his, almost never used mine. Maybe use in a future trip
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Schreifels

customer_reviews.title: It's Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good size. Holds a lot more than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: PINNER

customer_reviews.title: Do not EXPECT a waterproof container.
customer_reviews.text: This item does not stay latched. It opens up frequently spilling it's contents. It is not useful as a waterproof container. Unfortunately, by the time we took them on our vacation and realized they were junk the return window was closed.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Shields

customer_reviews.title: Case broke open!
customer_reviews.text: Watertight product but after 2 months of weekly use, the fastener that closes the case broke off; part of the case literally broke away. I would have lost key fob, credit card, and license had it broken while paddle boarding. Scary!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on the boat! Keeps everything dry. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Check

customer_reviews.title: Water tight
customer_reviews.text: Used it to keep money and credit card dry. Worked as described.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Osuna Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Need to include deminsions in description.
customer_reviews.text: Although this product was too small for the trip I am planning I did like it and will use it for other trips.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great light waterproof storage
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof, sweat proof when exercising, perfect for id and a few credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kansas

customer_reviews.title: They're the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this container for years now! They are the best containers for credit cards and drivers license. i have it for one front pocket and my wallet in the other front pocket to hold receipts! Thanks for making these!
customer_reviews.author: David R. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Too small for an electronic car key...
customer_reviews.text: Too small for an electronic car key so I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen K.

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be big enough for Passports but ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be big enough for Passports but is Not. I will Use it for my electrical phone cables & headphones etc
customer_reviews.author: bri1guy

customer_reviews.title: Works without worries.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly and was just what we needed. Kept our things dry and was worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The product is too small for any use I have. I should have paid more attention to the dimensions. No use for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Good qualty
customer_reviews.text: Im not try them but its feel good qualty and good price , i need it for my key on the kayak
customer_reviews.author: Roei e.

customer_reviews.title: Have not used them yet but size is good.
customer_reviews.text: Just want I was looking for. Have not used them yet but size is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basically one time use
customer_reviews.text: One was dropped once not from a super far distance and cracked immediately, rendering useless. The other was ok but did leak a little as the day went by.
customer_reviews.author: fiona alford

customer_reviews.title: No good for keys
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would hold my key fob for my car keys. It does not. Too narrow. Good for ID and Credit Card but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: mark patrick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: product was great exactly what I thought it would be

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keep money and credit card dry while in the water.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Used them tubing on the river and kept everything inside dry.

customer_reviews.text: They were exactly as I expected them to be. They arrived quickly and the prices was right
customer_reviews.author: John Sigers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just soaked these little products in water for 30minutesto see if they work!!! They do!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny D.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything dry
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We have a hotel key and a credit card and some cash in each one. They stay dry through ocean swimming and water slides

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly in water!
customer_reviews.text: On a trip where we were going to be in the water 90% of the time, this product held up and kept everything dry. Exactly as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good size for the beach and boat cruises, shore excursions.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for surf & sand!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our beach vacation. Played in the sand and surf everyday, and nothing was ever lost or wet!

customer_reviews.text: I used this on a cruise..Lots of room to carry items

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took this scuba diving 100 feet and it did not leak.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a couple of cards and a few bucks! Great for the outdoors!

customer_reviews.title: They were recommended by a friend
customer_reviews.text: We will be using them on our February vacation. They were recommended by a friend. I like the size and convenience.

customer_reviews.title: Great for use at the water park
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for the price. Great to use at the water park.

customer_reviews.title: not what i ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one LARGE waterproof Witz card holder. Instead i got 2 smaller id badge holders which is exactly what i did not want.

customer_reviews.text: Simple, lightweight and compact. Great while snorkeling or swimming in the ocean.

customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks in water, still all good and dry 👍

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice case has a lanyard and clip very nice and keep your stuff dry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery and the product is just perfect for my use.

customer_reviews.title: These are great cases. They are sturdy and hold quite a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great cases. They are sturdy and hold quite a few badges. The company is wonderful We had an issue with ordering and they took care of it right away.
customer_reviews.author: EMS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vacation
customer_reviews.text: Kept my things safe and dry in the theme parks. Big enough without being too bulky!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Melough

customer_reviews.title: Using for cruising
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we were looking for to take on future cruises. It's clear, so our cruise card can be scanned. It's small, but large enough to hold a credit card and a few bills for tip money. And waterproof, so we feel safer taking it on beach excursions. We cruise again in March, so hopefully we won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NI Jane

product_meta.title: Koala Lifestyle Witz Waterproof Floating Sports Case | Watertight Money ID Card Badge Holder Dry Box | Hard Crush Proof Small Outdoor Safe with Lanyard & Carabiner | 2pk Bundle + Pouch
feature_bullets: 3 ITEM BUNDLE: Includes 2 Witz Surf Safe Sports Cases (co branded with our Koala logo) and our soft cotton organizer travel pouch
HOLDS A LOT: 2.5" Wide x 3.7" High x .75" Thick | Perfect for carrying your drivers license, TWIC card, photo ID, credit card, money, or other badges and IDs | Includes Neck Lanyard & Carabiner
HEAVY DUTY & PROTECTIVE: Constructed of hard crush proof ABS plastic with rubber O-rings to keep out water and dust | Air Tight, Waterproof, & Dust Proof

SO MANY USES: Great for swimming, rafting, canoe, paddle board, paddlesports, kayaking, snorkeling, scuba diving, boating, river SUP, surfing, beach, or any other outdoors activity you can dream up | Even works underwater
KOALA PROMISE: We only sell great products. If you're not 100% satisfied, contact us for a full refund.
